snippet: The Kings and Blackhawks have played the most playoff games in the Western Conference. over the past three seasons, each winning a Stanley Cup, and will meet again in the conference finals, beginning Sunday in Chicago.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings and the Chicago Blackhawks have played the most playoff games in the Western Conference since 2011, each winning a Stanley Cup, and will meet again in 2014 conference finals.
lead_paragraph: The Kings and Blackhawks have played the most playoff games in the Western Conference. over the past three seasons, each winning a Stanley Cup, and will meet again in the conference finals, beginning Sunday in Chicago.

headline.seo: The Kings and Blackhawks Continue Their Dominance
headline.main: A Familiar Duel for the West Title
headline.print_headline: A Familiar Duel for the West Title
